meanings.definition: The function assumed or part played by a person or thing in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: In the school play, Sarah took on one of the lead roles.
meanings.sent2: Doctors and nurses have important roles in keeping people healthy.
meanings.sent3: The role of the clown in the circus was to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, each piece has a specific role to play.
meanings.sent5: The role of a teacher is to educate and inspire students to learn.

meanings.definition: A character or part played by an actor.
meanings.sent1: The actor prepared diligently for his role in the upcoming movie.
meanings.sent2: Shakespeare's plays often have complex and intriguing roles for actors.
meanings.sent3: The role of the villain in the play was portrayed with great intensity.
meanings.sent4: She embraced the role of the princess with grace and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The role of a superhero requires bravery and a strong sense of justice.
